short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture your favorite content from the web effortlessly, and make it available on all your connected devices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Capture your favorite content from the web with just one click. 

Memento extension allows you to quickly, with minimal efforts, aggregate all your favorite content from the web and send it to your Memento account. Your aggregated content will be made available on all your connected devices right away.

You will be able to organize your content from the extension, on the fly whenever you ave a new item, without needing to open Memento mobile or web app.

Also, a save button from Memento will be displayed on Twitter feed, to quickly capture your tweets, and put them in the right collection on the spot
